headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pyro
content: You don’t just want to plunge out of the sky at seizure-inducing speeds, wing-mounted machine guns blazing, and turn your business rivals into rubble. You want the final thought to pass through their soon-to-be-disintegrated-skulls to be “Wow, that fighter design is so unconventional”. And for someone in search of that perfect mixture of fear and awe, there’s only one word that should be on your lips: Pyro.
